DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether intravenous paracetamol is effective in treating labor pain.
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Effects of Intravenous Paracetamol on Labor Pain
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists physical class III term patients (≥ 37 weeks of gestation) previous cesarean section hypertension, preeclampsia, eclampsia intrauterine growth retardation intrauterine fetal death morbid obesity (body mass index ≥ 35) allergy to any of the study drugs
